answers.answer: I have gestational diabetes. There's no symptoms for you to tell if you have it or not. Around 26 weeks your doctor will order glucose tests and if you fail both then they'll put you on a diet and teach you to test your sugars. If that doesn't keep your numbers in check they'll put you either on insulin or a pill.
I failed my 1hr test Friday, I'm at the lab rite now doing my 3hr test I am 26w
Well im worried bc ive been a borderline diabetic like if my sugar gets to low i shake like crazy and get a god awful headache. Im only 7 weeks but i cant eat anything bc of the nausea

question: Does anyone on here have the diabetes u get just during pregnancy? If u do when did they start? And what were some of the symptoms? Thank u for any info
title: pregnancy diabetes
